title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions: Introducing our new and durable Stainless Steel Refrigerator Ice Scraper! Made with high-quality stainless steel and PP material, this ice removal tool is built to last. Keep your refrigerator tidy and clean by easily removing ice and frost with this practical mini ice shovel. Available in Blue, Grey, and Pink colors, this ice scraper measures approximately 17 x 4.5 cm. Each package includes one Fridge Ice Scraper. Please note that there may be a slight measuring deviation and color variation due to manual measurement and different monitors. Say goodbye to the hassle of removing ice from your fridge with our efficient and practical Fridge Ice Scraper!
